mapper.select: select id, monitor_id, monitor_name, monitor_node_id, system_name, clazz_name, method_name, attribute_name, attribute_field, attribute_value, create_time, update_time from monitor_data where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into monitor_data(monitor_id, monitor_name, monitor_node_id, system_name, clazz_name, method_name, attribute_name, attribute_field, attribute_value, create_time, update_time) values (#{monitorId}, #{monitorName}, #{monitorNodeId}, #{systemName}, #{clazzName}, #{methodName}, #{attributeName}, #{attributeField}, #{attributeValue}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})

insert into monitor_data(monitor_id, monitor_name, monitor_node_id, system_name, clazz_name, method_name, attribute_name, attribute_field, attribute_value, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.monitorId}, #{entity.monitorName}, #{entity.monitorNodeId}, #{entity.systemName}, #{entity.clazzName}, #{entity.methodName}, #{entity.attributeName}, #{entity.attributeField}, #{entity.attributeValue}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})

insert into monitor_data(monitor_id, monitor_name, monitor_node_id, system_name, clazz_name, method_name, attribute_name, attribute_field, attribute_value, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.monitorId}, #{entity.monitorName}, #{entity.monitorNodeId}, #{entity.systemName}, #{entity.clazzName}, #{entity.methodName}, #{entity.attributeName}, #{entity.attributeField}, #{entity.attributeValue}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})
on duplicate key update monitor_id = values(monitor_id), monitor_name = values(monitor_name), monitor_node_id = values(monitor_node_id), system_name = values(system_name), clazz_name = values(clazz_name), method_name = values(method_name), attribute_name = values(attribute_name), attribute_field = values(attribute_field), attribute_value = values(attribute_value), create_time = values(create_time), update_time = values(update_time)
mapper.update:
update monitor_data
monitor_id = #{monitorId},
monitor_name = #{monitorName},
monitor_node_id = #{monitorNodeId},
system_name = #{systemName},
clazz_name = #{clazzName},
method_name = #{methodName},
attribute_name = #{attributeName},
attribute_field = #{attributeField},
attribute_value = #{attributeValue},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
